channel.title: Client item id's
channel.description: is there any way to change them from like..you know how some clients have cape id's as like 9456 or w/e and silabsoft has it as 14573 or something. is there any way I can change it so my client recognises that cape as id 14573? like so you can have a skillcape whether you're using the client or silabs webclient.

item.title: Client item id's
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

I tried asking a question having to do with a client there and my thread got locked. apparently you can only ask questions about the moparscape client there.

Read full topic
